name: The Great Wobo Escape Ep.1
description:
In The Great Wobo Escape, you must help the high-tech robot Wobo escape from his mining colony. Optimized for NVIDIA SHIELD with specular highlights and 1080p visuals, guide Wobo through a number of different levels using stealth, solving puzzles, and using the environment to avoid detection by the Dieselpunk Robot overlords.

As featured in SHIELD Hub.


STEALTH & ACTION
Fast-paced action-filled stealth game full of puzzles, deadly enemies, hidden passages, dangerous traps and tricky hazards.

BEAUTIFUL 3D GRAPHICS
Pushing limits of mobile devices with detailed, high-res textures, environments and characters.

VISUALLY UNIQUE
Unique visual style – play as a futuristic high-tech robot, fight dieselpunk enemies of various sizes and shapes.

SCI-FI STORY
Rich story in an absorbing sci-fi world exploring a thin line between a machine and a living intelligence, where colony’s AI went rogue and persecutes robots.

FAMILY FRIENDLY FUN
Approachable by young audience – no blood, just a comic mischief with a pinch of sabotage towards evil robots!

CONSOLE-LIKE EXPERIENCE
Enjoy playing on your TV thanks to 1080p resolution, full gamepad controller and Nvidia Shield Android TV support.


This game features advanced graphics. To optimize performance, you may want to close down other running applications before playing the game.
